Anna Akana

The bicon who can do anything

Anna Akana at the 2018 EU Vidcon

Here's a timeline of Anna's life:

  • 1989: Born in Monterey County, California, USA
  • 2007: Her younger sister, Kristina, passed away through suicide
  • 2011: Attempted performing comedy at age 19 but switched to Youtube due to anxiety & panic attacks before going on stage
  • 2015: Appeared in Ant-Man
  • 2018: Came out of the closet as bisexual, what a bicon!
  • 2019: Transitioned from comedy to music & released her debut single "Intervention"
  • 2021: Acting and singing, Go Anna!

"A step-by-step takedown of 'yellow fever' or the desire to date Asian women often accompanied by bizarre, offensive attempts to do so, could start the healing. Luckily for us, YouTuber Anna Akana was more than up to the video-making task." -- Cate Matthews of The Huffington Post

If you have more time, you should have a look at Anna's Youtube Channel.
